subject: api question
text:
Hi Hugo and others, quick question about your api.  Many of the comments here in  this group are accompanied by excerpted sentences from the agreement being critiqued, and that excerpt is valuable for my project.  Would it be possible to keep the excerpt with the comment, perhaps call it a citation?

-Matt

-- 
www.tos-dr.info // www.twitter.com/tosdr // www.github.com/Unhosted/ToS-DR
